Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MPD

    public interface Server
    Author:
    bill

      Clears the current error message in the MPD status

    • Method Detail

      • clearError

        void clearError()
        Clears the current error message in the MPD status
        Throws:
        MPDConnectionException - if there is a problem sending the command to the server

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the connection to the MPD server.
        Throws:
        MPDConnectionException - if there is a problem sending the command to the server

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Returns the MPD version running on the server.
        Returns:
        the version of the MPD

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Determines if there is a connection to the MPD server.
        Returns:
        true if connected to server , false if not

      • getArtworkFinder

        ArtworkFinder getArtworkFinder()

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns true if close() has been called. Once closed a new MPD will need to be created. Automatic reconnections will not be attempted after close is called.
        Returns:
        true if close() has been called
